description: Complete scanner improvements across 3 phases: Phase 1 - Scanner core improvements (AST, caching, performance), Phase 2 - Docs integration (leverage scanner outputs), Phase 3 - Workflow integration (planning with enhanced context)

phase_1.name: Scanner Core Improvements
gate_criteria: All 7 scanner improvements implemented (P1.1, P1.2, P2.4, P2.5, P3.7, P3.8, P4.11)
AST scanner integrated with useAST option

orchestrator.role: Coordinate 3-phase scanner integration. Validate phase gates, synthesize results across coderef-core, coderef-docs, coderef-workflow.
orchestrator.notes: All 3 phases complete. Phase 1: 7/7 improvements (100%). Phase 2: 4/4 integrations (100%). Phase 3: 3/3 integrations (100%). Total tests: 87/87 passing. All phase gates met.

agents.role: Phase 1 Lead: Implement 7 scanner improvements (AST integration, caching, performance, coverage)
agents.notes: Phase 1 COMPLETE (7/7): AST integration, Comment filtering, Parallel processing, LRU caching, Relationships (imports/dependencies/calledBy/complexity), Dynamic imports, Progress reporting. Tests: 554/558 passing (99.3%).

agents.role: Phase 2 Lead: Integrate scanner improvements into foundation docs, resource sheets, and doc generation
agents.notes: Phase 2 COMPLETE (4/4): AST type filtering, complexity metrics integration, relationship mapping, dynamic import warnings. Tests: 30/30 passing (100%). Git commits: 11. Lines added: 1,748+.

agents.role: Phase 3 Lead: Integrate scanner improvements into planning, impact analysis, and execution workflows
agents.notes: Phase 3 COMPLETE (3/3): Planning workflows with full type coverage, impact analysis with relationship graphs, execution tracking with complexity metrics. Tests: 57/57 passing (100%). Git commits: 17. Implementation: 667 lines. Testing: 1,910 lines.
